name: 安い
meaning_mnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of cheap? It's also cheap. Time to go to a 100円 shop and get some 安い goods, ammiright?
reading_mnemonic:
Would you like this item for cheap?
Uh, yes (やす) please!
